name: 高等量子力學（二）
goals: Learn about relativistic quantum mechanics and fundamental quantum field theory
syllabus:
lecture hours: 3 hrs/week, 16+2 weeks in total

1.     Week 1: Regularizations and  \\phi^4 theory I

2.     Week 2: Regularizations and  \\phi^4 theory II

3.     Week 3: QED I

4.     Week  4: QED II

5.     Week  5: Renormalization of Yang-Mills theories I

6.     Week 6: Renormalization of Yang-Mills theories II

7.     Week 6: Renormalization of Yang-Mills theories III

8.     Week  7: Effective action I

9.     Week 8: Effective action II

10.   Week 9: Covariant Gaussian approximation I

11.  Week 10: Covariant Gaussian approximation II

12.   Week  11: Topological objects in field theories I

13.  Week 12:  Topological objects in field theories II

14.  Week 13: Finite temperature Quantum field theories

15.  Week 14: Schwinger Keldysh formalism I

16.  Week 15: Schwinger Keldysh formalism II

17.  Week 16: Reoprt I

18.  Week 17: Reoprt II
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
